title: Githzerai
entryLore: Githzerai are disciplined dwellers of the Everchanging Chaos of Limbo. Utilizing their potent psionic powers, they stabilize the chaotic environment around them and maintain a sharp mental focus that wards off external influence. They are often monks and philosophers, dedicated to a life of mental discipline and the pursuit of inner peace amidst the roiling chaos of their home plane.

traits.name: Githzerai Psionics
traits.description: You know the [[mage_hand|Mage Hand]] cantrip, and the hand is [[invisible_condition|Invisible]] when you cast the cantrip with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast [[shield|Shield]] once per long rest. Starting at 5th level, you can cast [[detect_thoughts|Detect Thoughts]] once per long rest. You can cast these spells without components, and can also cast them using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

traits.name: Mental Discipline
traits.description: You have [[advantage|Advantage]] on [[saving_throw|saving throws]] you make to avoid or end the [[charmed_condition|Charmed]] and [[frightened_condition|Frightened]] conditions.
